actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to fund adolescent health demonstration projects.
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to maternal health services
Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Mandates grants for the establishment or support of adolescent health demonstration projects to: (1) provide health care information, counseling, and services, including related social services; (2) serve adolescents before their graduation from high school; (3) encourage family participation; and (4) establish community advisory committees. Prohibits using grant funds to perform or pay for abortions.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to fund adolescent health demonstration projects.
